coreCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

notification-post-watchlists.description: Pulls posts related to watchlist symbols and sends a notification
notification-post-watchlists.name: tradingpost-job-production-notification-post-watchlists

notification-post-holdings.description: Pulls posts related to the holdings that users have when they've signed up with a brokerage account
notification-post-holdings.name: tradingpost-job-production-notification-post-holdings

notification-new-trades.description: Send a notification to a user who follows someone, and that someone has new holds/has made trades
notification-new-trades.name: tradingpost-job-production-notification-new-trades

generate-brokerage-tasks.description: Generates tasks for brokerage to process
generate-brokerage-tasks.name: tradingpost-job-production-generate-brokerage-tasks

brokerage-task-runner.description: Runs brokerage tasks that are pushed to SQS queue -- rather than on cadence
brokerage-task-runner.name: tradingpost-job-production-brokerage-task-runner

add-holidays.description: Ingests market holidays once a year
add-holidays.name: tradingpost-job-production-add-holidays

eod-pricing.description: Ingests pricing for securities after market close & allow for 15min delay to kick in
eod-pricing.name: tradingpost-job-production-eod-pricing

morning-pricing-forward.description: Roll yesterdays is_eod pricing forward, then let our IEX pricing dictate the rest
morning-pricing-forward.name: tradingpost-job-production-morning-pricing-forward

securities-information.description: Runs every trading day at 5AM ET and updates securities information
securities-information.name: tradingpost-job-production-securities-information

securities-update.description: Pulls in new securities and data from IEX and pushes new data over ot our security table
securities-update.name: tradingpost-job-production-securities-update
